name: Eudora the Exploder
description:
"¡Hola! Me llamo Eudora."

Enter the ruins of a temple and navigate its rooms to retrieve a mysterious artifact. As a self-proclaimed “professional exploder,” you are equipped with nothing but explosives. Be careful not to use more than two bombs per room or the temple might collapse!

CONTROLS

  • A: move left
  • D: move right
  • Space: jump
  • F: enter door
  • R: restart level
  • LMB: drop bomb
  • RMB: detonate

CREDITS

  • Art
    Scribble Platformer by Kenney.nl
  • Music
    Negev Desert Loop by Dizzy Crow
  • Font
    Pixabubble by Chequered Ink
